## Properties

| Property               | Attribute | Description              | Type                                                                            | Default     |
| ---------------------- | --------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `variant` _(required)_ | `variant` | Type of Menu Part to use | `"description" \| "header" \| "heading" \| "label" \| "section" \| "separator"` | `undefined` |
